CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Ability to recommend courses to groups
CurrentVersion.description: Allows users to use existing user groups while making recommendations.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Ability to recommend courses to groups
OldVersion.description: Allows users to use existing user groups while making recommendations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights leader deep-dive reports focus on customers, business operations and agility
CurrentVersion.description: There will be a new report for leaders in Viva Insights app in Teams tied to business outcomes. Leaders can view a bundle of relevant metrics and suggested actions. Leaders can further drill down by customizing the filters such as time periods, benchmarks, scopes, view insights breakdown by groups within their organization, and more.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights leader deep-dive reports focus on customers, business operations and agility
OldVersion.description: There will be a new report for leaders in Viva Insights app in Teams tied to business outcomes. Leaders can view a bundle of relevant metrics and suggested actions. Leaders can further drill down by customizing the filters such as time periods, benchmarks, scopes, view insights breakdown by groups within their organization, and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Add a hyperlink or text callout to a video at specific times
CurrentVersion.description: Make your video interactive and more engaging by adding annotations that can include hyperlinks and text. Call out important moments or share documents and other links to additional resources. You can add text and links anywhere in the video timeline to help guide your viewers to the right information. Note: The release state and clouds now reflect the current status. Government clouds will release at a later date. We apologize for any inconveniences.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Add a hyperlink or text callout to a video at specific times
OldVersion.description: Make your video interactive and more engaging by adding annotations that can include hyperlinks and text. Call out important moments or share documents and other links to additional resources. You can add text and links anywhere in the video timeline to help guide your viewers to the right information. Note: The release state and clouds now reflect the current status. Government clouds will release at a later date. We apologize for any inconveniences.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Add a survey, poll, or quiz to a video at specific times
CurrentVersion.description: Make your video interactive and more engaging by adding a survey, quiz, or poll using Microsoft Forms. You can add forms anywhere in the video timeline for videos you own. Go to Microsoft Forms to view responses and share a summary link with answers and scores in Microsoft Forms.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Add a survey, poll, or quiz to a video at specific times
OldVersion.description: Make your video interactive and more engaging by adding a survey, quiz, or poll using Microsoft Forms. You can add forms anywhere in the video timeline for videos you own. Go to Microsoft Forms to view responses and share a summary link with answers and scores in Microsoft Forms.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Skin tone reactions
CurrentVersion.description: In Teams settings, users have the option to select their preferred skin tone. This preference will be applied to all emojis and reactions in chats, channels, and desktop/web meetings, allowing users to express themselves more authentically in conversations.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Skin tone reactions
OldVersion.description: In Teams settings, users have the option to select their preferred skin tone. This preference will be applied to all emojis and reactions in chats, channels, and desktop/web meetings, allowing users to express themselves more authentically in conversations.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Create with Templates
CurrentVersion.description: ,We're refreshing the file creation experience in OneDrive for Web which you initiate by clicking the “Add new” button. Soon, clicking the “Add new” button in OneDrive will give you the option to create a blank file or choose from a selection a high-quality, beautifully designed Word, Excel and PowerPoint templates to jumpstart your work.

OldVersion.title: OneDrive: Create with Templates
OldVersion.description: ,We're refreshing the file creation experience in OneDrive for Web which you initiate by clicking the “Add new” button. Soon, clicking the “Add new” button in OneDrive will give you the option to create a blank file or choose from a selection a high-quality, beautifully designed Word, Excel and PowerPoint templates to jumpstart your work.

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Preview of New Sticky Notes app on Windows available from OneNote app
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft is expanding its notetaking solution, OneNote, to include users who need a simple and quick way to jot down ideas and remember important information while staying focused on the task at hand. New Sticky Notes is a new experience built on the foundation of OneNote that offers the same experience as existing Sticky Notes, while making it easier to capture screenshots, automatically add the source information to the notes, and more. Existing Microsoft Sticky Note users on Windows will gradually be transitioned to the new Sticky Notes app.

OldVersion.title: OneNote: Preview of New Sticky Notes app on Windows available from OneNote app
OldVersion.description: Microsoft is expanding its notetaking solution, OneNote, to include users who need a simple and quick way to jot down ideas and remember important information while staying focused on the task at hand. New Sticky Notes is a new experience built on the foundation of OneNote that offers the same experience as existing Sticky Notes, while making it easier to capture screenshots, automatically add the source information to the notes, and more. Existing Microsoft Sticky Note users on Windows will gradually be transitioned to the new Sticky Notes app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - New device properties in device onboarding page
CurrentVersion.description: ,Added new device details to provide more insights on the device health. This includes OS build, Defender engine version, Defender Mocamp version, sensitive data activity, Advanced Classification bandwidth usage exceeded, valid user, server DLP status, and first onboarded date.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - New device properties in device onboarding page
OldVersion.description: ,Added new device details to provide more insights on the device health. This includes OS build, Defender engine version, Defender Mocamp version, sensitive data activity, Advanced Classification bandwidth usage exceeded, valid user, server DLP status, and first onboarded date.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Microsoft Copilot with graph grounded chat in the Microsoft 365 mobile app
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft 365 mobile app users with a Copilot for Microsoft 365 license will be able to receive answers grounded in their organizational graph data.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Microsoft Copilot with graph grounded chat in the Microsoft 365 mobile app
OldVersion.description: Microsoft 365 mobile app users with a Copilot for Microsoft 365 license will be able to receive answers grounded in their organizational graph data.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage navigation model enhancements
CurrentVersion.description: Updates on Viva Engage navigation model to bring consistency across web and Teams and Outlook integrations and simplify finding everything Viva Engage has to offer.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage navigation model enhancements
OldVersion.description: Updates on Viva Engage navigation model to bring consistency across web and Teams and Outlook integrations and simplify finding everything Viva Engage has to offer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Bulk replacement or removal of a retention label
CurrentVersion.description: ,Admins can perform a bulk replacement or removal of a retention label using the Purview compliance portal. They can perform the action across the entire tenant or targeted to specific content using KQL and static or adaptive scopes.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Archive File Support for Mac Endpoints
CurrentVersion.description: ,DLP will inspect the content of every archive file when it is created, modified, or read. On inspection, all the files (of supported file format) within the archive file will be classified and evaluated against active DLP policies. After, the archive file will get the applicable auditing/enforcement policy applied to it.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to block Attendee Emails from Teams Town Halls
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows the organizers of town halls to block the sending of attendee emails from Microsoft Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  eDiscovery (Premium) – Hold reports
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Out-of-the-box reports that contain information about all legal holds associated with eDiscovery cases in the Microsoft Purview compliance portal. Sort and filter your view based on various criteria and download the aggregated information for further analysis.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  eDiscovery (Premium) – Hold reports
OldVersion.description:
,
Out-of-the-box reports that contain information about all legal holds associated with eDiscovery cases in the Microsoft Purview compliance portal. Sort and filter your view based on various criteria and download the aggregated information for further analysis.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  eDiscovery (Premium) – Hold reports (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: Out-of-the-box reports that contain information about all legal holds associated with eDiscovery cases in the Microsoft Purview compliance portal. Sort and filter your view based on various criteria and download the aggregated information for further analysis.

OldVersion.description: Out-of-the-box reports that contain information about all legal holds associated with eDiscovery cases in the Microsoft Purview compliance portal. Sort and filter your view based on various criteria and download the aggregated information for further analysis.
